project.name: Geronimo :: JavaMail Specification
project.shortDescription: These classes represent the API of the JavaMail Specification, taken from J2EE 1.4 API documentation and on the JavaMail 1.3 specification PDF.
project.description: The JavaMail API allows programs to send mail messages and to be able to interrogate a remote mail store (e.g. POP/IMAP inbox) for the message location. This provides only the API; there are no implemented stores or transports here (but you may provide your own, or use the ones developed in geronimo-mail).
